sentences.sContent: "We've got life-size cutouts of William and Kate, " boasts one headmistress, claiming: "The children are really excited."
sentences.sContent_eng: "We've got life-size cutouts of William and Kate, " boasts one headmistress, claiming: "The children are really excited."
sentences.sCn: “我们制作了真人大小的威廉和凯特的人像，”一名女校长沾沾自喜地炫耀着：“孩子们可兴奋了。”

sentences.sContent: When I was growing up in the colony of Hong Kong, my British headmistress would glare when we asked to learn Chinese, and hiss: “If you want to learn Chinese, go onto the streets!”
sentences.sContent_eng: When I was growing up in the colony of Hong Kong, my British headmistress would glare when we asked to learn Chinese, and hiss: “If you want to learn Chinese, go onto the streets!”
sentences.sCn: 我成长在当时还是英国殖民地的香港，我的英籍女校长对我们要求学习中文的请求不屑一顾，并嘶声说道：“如果你想学习中文，就到街上去！”

sentences.sContent: In 1987 the school headmistress referred the case to the Institute of Child Health at University College London.
sentences.sContent_eng: In 1987 the school headmistress referred the case to the Institute of Child Health at University College London.
sentences.sCn: 1987年，学校校长将这些儿童的案例提交至伦敦大学学院儿童健康研究所。

trans.tranOther: a female teacher who is in charge of a school
